##Problem 1
```{r}
set_missing <- function(x) {
  if(is.numeric(x)){
    #x = replace_na(x, round(mean(x, na.rm=TRUE), digits=1))
    x[is.na(x)] <- round(mean(x, na.rm=TRUE))
    return(x)
  }
  else if (is.character(x)) {
    #x = replace_na(x,"virginica")
    x[is.na(x)] <- "virginica"
    return(x)
  }
}

#map(iris_with_missing, set_missing)
```
